content.p: Now in their third year, the Knowledge Exchange and Impact Awards continue to recognise and celebrate impact across all research disciplines. Awards categories cover Knowledge Exchange and impact (commercial, societal, policy) in each faculty, as well as policy impact, media awards and a Vice Chancellor’s award. The awards will raise awareness of the exceptional work across the University and celebrate Knowledge Exchange projects on the pathway to success as well as those projects which are more advanced. Showcase your success by entering, or nominate a deserving colleague (you can nominate others in the media, policy impact and VC’s award categories only). The awards provide an exciting opportunity to celebrate your achievements with your colleagues and learn more about the fantastic impact across the University. Winners will be announced at an awards ceremony at the East Midlands Conference Centre. Entry deadline: Thursday 5 July 2018 Nominations announced: Monday 17 September 2018 Awards ceremony: Thursday 22 November 2018 Need some help? email the event team Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH telephone: +44 (0) 115 748 4555 fax: +44 (0) 115 823 2181 email: keiawards@nottingham.ac.uk
